_header: Christ to His apostles said these saws
_description: Gospel for the first Friday in Lent, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle — in couplets

BLHar4196.First Lines: Crist to his apostels said þis sawsȜe haue herd said oft in olde daws…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …Þan bus vs forgif al misdedeIf we of forgifnes will spede
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Audistis quia dictum est antiquis.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: fferia vi in capite ieiunii Secundum Matheum (rubric, f. 42rb)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): II.32-36.
